message: Let's see how many folks join before we harshly judge convore. ;-)
Hey guys, long time listener, first time caller... :-)
So what is this supposed to be?
I believe the real question is: into what can we turn convore, specifically for the advantage for CVREG?
I'm not exactly sure what this is supposed to be, maybe a lighter google groups thing.
I like the idea of a lighter google groups with a nice iphone app.  I'll talk here with you guys if that is where people will talk.  Is there someplace else that people are talking?
@danielferrell: people can talk here. there's also the irc channel #rubycodejam - not sure how many people still visit - but there's usually always someone there
A good, usable UI at least.  Perhaps useful, though more useful than email?  If it was there wouldn't be a "[ ] send me an email when someone creates a new topic" option.
